snippet.title: Exodus Borealis - Release Trailer [Colony Builder + Tower Defense Game for PC]
snippet.description:
In this city builder and tower defense game, you will command a small band of ship wrecked colonists. Progress from struggling to survive the elements to a thriving kingdom that will smash the demon hordes that dare attack your settlement. Releasing on PC November 18th for PC!

You can play the demo or get the game now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1528810/Exodus_Borealis/
